website_summaries.verdict: This versatile lamp provides numerous lighting options and looks great in any room of the home.
pros: Light has choice of five colors and three brightness levels
Height adjustable, so it can be used as a floor or table light
cons: Some owners report the light failing to turn off completely after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Light!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I wanted. Packed exceptionally well to arrive in perfect condition. Very easy to assemble in just a couple of minutes. Clear instructions. I need the light for crocheting, sewing, and working jigsaw puzzles. Light touch control with multiple light selections and each dimmable to where you need it. Fits perfectly next to my couch but portable as well. Checks all the boxes for what I needed and more.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my art space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp thinking it would be great for working at home. And quickly moved it next to my art table and left it there. The brightest setting is perfect for detail work. Love that it's adjustable. Recommending it to friends as a great WFH and detail work lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Appliance Queen

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a fabulous floor lamp. It is modern and sleek. It is so pretty. I makes the most wonderful light colors and intensities. I does not create glare on your TV screen across the room because it only throws light where you point it. This lamp is so well made it will most likely last your lifetime. This is the best floor lamp I have ever owned. I have two Taotronics desk lamps also and they are equally beautiful and well made. Thank you so much Taotronics and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Reading Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I love that it's physically adjustable and you can adjust the light. It was a great price and a great product. Will probably order another one for my coloring area :)
customer_reviews.author: SueAnne

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I am a reading light "connoisseur" and this is the best I've come across to date. I especially like the modes options, however the dimming option could provide another lower level for my liking. It took me a few attempts to understand the timer; it has just one timer setting, one hour. I was never still present when the timer kicked in.
customer_reviews.author: Kokimoe

customer_reviews.title: High quality lamp with great versatility
customer_reviews.text: This lamp far exceeded our expectations. It assembled easily with a good, tight fit. It can be assembled as a floor lamp or a desk lamp of varied height. The gooseneck is easy to maneuver. The choice of light "tone" and brightness is great. Most important to us is the fact that the light can be adjusted for the benefit of the user without shining into the eyes of other people in the room. If I needed another lamp I'd buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I needed a black reading lamp to put beside a wing-back chair in my master bedroom that has black wrought iron accents. I am pleased with this one. The base is small enough to nudge in the corner area by the chair and is very unobtrusive. I love the switch with dimmer features, especially at night. The only "surprise" was the head of the lamp itself is a tad larger than I expected, but not a problem. Very happy with this purchase and can see this lamp in several places throughout a home. Perfect for apartments or condos or even that private little corner in a large home. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TNGal

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but cannot work with the smart plug
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 minutes to put the parts together and the lamp looks nice in the living room. However after I plugged it into a smart plug (I have a kasa wifi plug) I realized the lamp won't work with it--If the lamp is on, I can use the kasa app to turn it off. But after I use the kasa app to turn on the plug, the lamp would not be turned back on. This is a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: J. L

customer_reviews.title: Light neck is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months light fixture will not stay in any set position; it will fall to a vertical position and becomes a useless piece of junk; it is beyond return date so I am out of the money I pad for this lamp. I strongly recommend that you do not waste your money by purchasing this lamp; it is poorly manufactured. DO NOT PURCHASE REGARDLESS OF GOOD REVIEWS IT IS JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Mac from Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn off :/
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, less than six months after purchase, the light does not turn all the way off. If the plug is in, there is a low light shining at all times. I have to unplug the whole light to turn it off :( Originally, I really liked this lamp but I am not sure if it is malfunctioning now. I would love the company to contact me and help resolve this issue. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Light shuts off by itself randomly and light flickers
customer_reviews.text: I used this lamp for only 5 days and it now flickers randomly and turns off by itself randomly. And yes, I am aware of the auto shut-off mode which is not the case. There is a defect in my lamp -- not what I expected from TaoTronics because I use some of their other product which are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Eamoo

customer_reviews.title: Shines all over, in your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Needs an egg crate louver or some kind of light modifier. Not directional. I had to put on a baseball cap to use it for reading. And then it still reflected off the tv into my eyes. On the other hand, the customer service is WONDERFUL. And the base is solid. The pole is solid. The buttons are reachable (unlike a foot switch) and work great. Feels like it will last a long time. Really is great for reading. Or can dim it and point at the wall behind me during TV watching.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Light temperatures are great!
customer_reviews.text: Assembling the LED light was so easy, since it comes with instructions. I really enjoy changing the light temperatures, because I don't strain my eyes as much. It lights up my whole room and I can bend it from the neck to brighten up in specific areas, especially my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy (original and replacement failed)
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved the design and features. After about 3 months, I lost the ability to change the light temperatures. TaoTronics sent me a replacement. This lasted less time. Too much time elapsed so I was unable to get reimbursed. Oh well, sometime you eat the bear, sometimes it eats you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Good Design and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is excellent. Unlike a previous Chinese lamp, this one is bright enough for reading. At first I was doubtful about the touch controls, but then I realized that mechanical switches are the primary failure point on such products (especially on flashlights). Note that you can use this lamp on a desk by discarding the two sections of the stand. Otherwise it is perfect lamp for the end of my sofa, where I never lay down and relax to read,, but always sit erect with good posture as a military academy student might. I bought three of these lamps, and, so far, I have a good opinion of them. They make it hard to hate the Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: $44 "DISPOSAL" LED Floor Lamp. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well right up till the illumination head, AKA the LED Light. When this "LED Bulb" goes out so does the lamp unless you enjoy deconstructing and reassembling the entire light head This is a $44 DISPOSAL LED floor lamp! If you cam buy the warranty for $45 You get an $89 LED Floor lamp. Worth it? No! No! No!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great Therapeutic Light Quality at a Value Price!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has several different ‘types’ of light at different intensities. I am impressed with the significance of the therapeutic qualities of the light. This lamp was extremely easy to assemble, has easy touch on and off controls and the gooseneck is extremely flexible. This lamp provides everything I wanted plus more at a very affordable price. I adore it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne E. Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters bedroom. She needed a nice lamp and I didn't like the standard bulb lamps because they either focus their light straight up or you adjust it and that light hits your eyes at the wrong intensity. The thing I love about this lamp is the flexible upper shaft to direct the light and the multiple intensity settings from a calm dim light to something to fill the room. 3 different color settings but she sticks with the bright white and it looks great. Easy 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: mrtodd_1

customer_reviews.title: Nice supplemental light for a small plant
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Using as a supplemental plant light. As winter comes near I needed a plant to get a little extra light. I purchased this after having found it recommended for exactly that on a plant forum I participate in. I like the touch functions, they seem to work well. The dimmer and different color temp settings also seem to work well although I am using it on full brightness with both sets of LEDs on. I've had it running apx. 14 hours daily since I purchased it. No problems at all! I have no doubt this would serve as a great reading lamp, too.
customer_reviews.author: Krankenheim

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It gives great light and the brightness can be adjusted with the touch of a finger. I use it to light my desk. It bends easily up or down or sideways to put the light just where I want. When coming into a dark room, a tiny light shows where to touch to turn it on. So easy to put together-a child could do it. So very glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Crim

customer_reviews.title: Lasted three months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I noticed it flickering off and on - both while turned off and while turned on. Had to unplug. Disappointing. UPDATE - contacted company and received a replacement light without a big hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bolte

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very easy to assemble (it took less than 3 minutes) and it can be converted into a desk/table lamp if you prefer. Also, the touch controls are very user-friendly and the dimmer options are convenient. Additionally, this lamp is reasonably priced. However, the negatives include a base that's not sturdy when used as a floor lamp, a light bulb that appears unable to be removed (which seems to mean you'll have to buy a whole new lamp when the light bulb loses its ability to produce light) and evidently an odd reason to select the letter m as the touch control that changes the light settings. Despite that, this is a great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Suh

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reading lamp after looking through all the lamps offered reading all the reviews I selected this one. I'm more than happy with my choice. I have nothing negative to offer on this lamp. I enjoy the many different lighting choices soft to bright very nice. Folks if you a great reading lamp for the money you can't go wrong with this one! Five stars I'd give it more if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Unlike any other floor lamp I have ever owned including cheap less than 10.00 models, have the power cord coming out of the base so it remains unseen, this has the power cord dangling over half way down the pole which makes it look cheap and tacky, I used twist ties to hold the cord close to the pole however the dangling cord is still visible.
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: Gooseneck is particularly well-made
customer_reviews.text: As a former mechanical engineer myself, I applaud the engineers behind this gooseneck. Its clearly sturdy and holds the lights in place but manages to be supple enough for even the weakest user to easily adjust. Otherwise, the touch buttons are a nice touch (pun not intended) and make it so that the base doesn't have to be very large to keep the lamp standing firmly when the light is being adjusted. The light itself is bright and warm-light aficionados like myself love that the lamp remembers the last set light tone and brightness level when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Black Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not as bright as desired. Dangling cord.
customer_reviews.text: It’s reasonably good looking however the images did not make it clear that the cord is just dangling along the outside. Base is pretty sturdy. Light temperature options are very nice, but it’s not as bright as I had hoped and I had emailed extensively with Taotronics to be recommended the brightest lamp they have available. Edited: working fine after a few months now still. Their customer service reached out to offer a gift card apology for the misrepresentation, which I accepted. Updated to 4 stars. If it’s bright enough for your needs and you realize the cord is external from the head of the lamp, then it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: C McD

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I have started painting and crafting again, and definitely needed to illuminate my work area more. I am not good at assembly--but this lamp was super simple, literally, just a few steps and no tools required. It is weighted just right--doesn't tip over, but is lightweight enough to move wherever needed. I love all the different lighting modes--I am sure the settings will accommodate any need or preference. The lamp neck is adjustable as well as the tilt of the light itself. All in all, a very useful and versatile lamp. It has made my workspace so much easier to use--it is also wonderful for reading
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and constructed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible construction. The head is big and flexible to a fault. No one good position that isn’t blinding, unless you use this strictly as a desk lamp. The base on mine fell apart after one very light tip over - the part where the bottom pole connects to the next one up doesn’t have enough threads (length) inside the one below to hold it steady. The minor weight of the overhead light tipped the lamp and bent the thread connection. The power cord also weirdly runs up the side via cheap plastic clips. It looks tacky. Would not recommend this. Poorly design and constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Sojum

customer_reviews.title: Not Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. It is very bright. It can be dimmed down a lot. Look very stylish. It seems to be built well, and the controls very handy and work easily. The light head can be moved in an infinite amount of positions. Very very happy with this lamp. Not the typical Chinese junk that seems to be all over Amazon. So tire of making returns to Amazon for crap from China, but this product seems to be good. Hopefully, it will stand the test of time. After using this lamp for over a month I ordered another one for my wife. Couldn't be happier. Best 50 bucks you'll ever spend
customer_reviews.author: Paul. Lueders

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp. Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product a 5 star rating because the customer service. Unfortunately, the lamp failed after about one month (turned into a disco strobe light), so I contacted the seller and manufacturer. They replaced it in a couple days, which I really appreciated because I really liked this lamp. It’s sturdy, seems well made, is bright, and has options for lots of different lighting modes. I’m sure these things are produced in large quantities so defects will happen on occasion. But as long as the manufacturer and seller stand behind their products and do the right thing I’m 100% satisfied. So, I recommend it and would buy it again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: JR_azon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Received two of these lamps in great condition. The instructions were easy to follow. Nice bright light in each setting. The base is heavy and sturdy. This floor lamp does not wobble. I tested the timer and it does shut off after an hour. I like everything about this lamp but the cord clamps. They kept popping off and my puppies would be chewing on them with a quickness; before I could tell they had the clamps in their mouths. I stopped putting the cord clamps on them and would invite parents of small children & puppies to not use them. Otherwise a good, solid floor lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality lamp and I love the brightness levels and colors. It goes from a subtle accent lamp to room brightener. Another client complained about the light for the power button but I love that as it makes it easy to find that button in the dark. Also, the on/off light is not bright at all and it can always be turned around. The buttons are touch sensitive and very responsive. The gooseneck is very fine quality, feels great and holds the lamp in any position that is desired. This was an incredible deal and replaces an old floor lamp that I had which produced much heat and was not nearly as flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: The cord shows
customer_reviews.text: I find the cord showing is very unattractive. I will be returning the two I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this lamp. I used it daily for reading. I like the option of light colors and dimming, like the flexibility, and the size, which takes up very little space. It is very sturdy and solid. I am ordering another one as a spare that can be easily moved when I need extra light in other places. Great for projects and working puzzles, painting, making jewelry...and it stands up to 4 rowdy cats without being knocked over. Highly recommend! Also,very easy to put together, even for an old lady!
customer_reviews.author: NKL

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The dimmable feature is nice, the three color spectrums is nice, but the reason I love this thing is the overall flexibility of it. We have a couple in the house now. My wife has one with all the sections and uses it as a floor lamp when she's knitting. I have one with a section left out and I use it to boost my table lights for detailed painting, carving, wiring, etc. Need light somewhere? This is the ticket. It looks unobtrusive when not in use, and provides great light when you need it. What more do you want from a lamp?
customer_reviews.author: Xdmshooter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful adjustable light for crafters, readers, those looking for a versatile floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is wonderful. I use it to see my crochet/knitting projects at night and use it nearly daily. I’ve also used it for some extra light when installing a light fixture and to light a backdrop for handmade item listings for Etsy. The light itself is very adjustable (adjust the height by not using all of the rods for the base), and I like having different brightness options, as well as the option for different types of light (cool, natural, and warm). I recommend this for any crafter in need of a great project light who doesn’t want to pay the Ottlite price tag! This lamp would work great to illuminate a quilting, sewing, or papercrafting project, as well.
customer_reviews.author: vancanfan03

customer_reviews.title: Great for small detail work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for use in my lash studio. I had a precious on that was larger and took up more space and the arm wasn't very flexible. This was an upgrade. Even thought there are multiple levels of brightness, I typically use the brightest white light. The arm is very flexible and stays where I put it. The power cord is detachable, which is nice for moving it out of the way when not in use. The base and the light themselves take up very little room. The light is very sturdy. I usually leave a personal size fan clipped to the arm near the top, and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp during Prime Day and for the price, it is a great deal. It feels solidly built. Very easy to assemble even without instructions. That's not saying it didn't come with them, just that assembly was straight forward. You can make it shorter by eliminating one pole as well. I love the 3 color options for lighting as well as the 5 levels of brightness! The neck is adjustable so you can maneuver it to your liking. So far I'm satisfied with this lamp. I hope it lasts. I'll update if it doesn't, but I recommend it unless you want something more expensive looking.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these lamps and placed them at two sides of my drawing table. They throw uniform light over a large drawing table surface and the color temp control makes it easy to switch between daylight for painting and the warm light for studying. Light intensity can be varied from dim night light to bright working light. Very nice floor lamp, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: 3DMicPro

customer_reviews.title: Great for Playing the Piano
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lamp that was bright enough and tall enough to illuminate sheet music without it having to sit in front of me. This lamp is bright and perfect for playing on a grand piano
customer_reviews.author: Konagal

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics Brightness of Lighting - Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp provides a lot of light, which I so appreciate in my study room. I use this one and another TaoTronics desk lamp to work on my devos and projects, and I can read! I can relax and don't have to squint and work my glasses every which way to read. I got another of the desk lamps very recently for my use when I watch TV so that I can still read and not bother my husband. (=
customer_reviews.author: jlala

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: Good lamp for $50, may be more simple than a $70 one but seems more durable with its metal tubing running up half its total length a more simple and streamlined design and with its abundant reviews on amazon, I expect this taotronics lamp to last longer than the "KEDSUM Dimmable Eye-Care LED Floor Lamp with Remote Control Switch" that was $71 before tax and lasted about a year (lamp head broke off its gooseneck as it was only held together with two small metal screws holding on to weak and sparse thread like plastic that broke apart inside the fancy joint no wonder it's currently on sale for $35.) this one doesn't seem to have that problem
customer_reviews.author: Mverovoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around, but not suitable for a smart outlet
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was amazingly well-packaged, easy to put together, and is very sturdy. The daylight color is the best I’ve ever seen (I keep thinking the sun is still out. 🤦‍♂️) The only issue I have is that it’s not suitable for a smart outlet, because the controls are entirely digital - When power is cut off to the lamp when the lamp is on, and then the power is restored, you have to touch the controls to turn it back on again. That wasn’t something I thought to look for.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this lamp. My home office has floor to ceiling windows in front of my desk so back lighting is a huge problem. I was grabbing every lamp in the house trying to make it work. This lamp I just put behind me for back light and it's awesome! I also take photos to sell and this lamp help brighten up my light box from the front to help keep colors true. I'm buying two more! One for my husband's office and one for our puzzle table in our cabin!
customer_reviews.author: vinobear

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Like this floor lamp. True to description; color temperatures, etc. and it can be dimmed to your liking. Only caveats, wish the cord was longer so you could easily thread it behind furniture and a “clear” colored cord would be better so it is less noticeable against the wall. Otherwise it does what it was made to do.
customer_reviews.author: Radmichime02

customer_reviews.title: Only needs to have the cord inside the pole of the lamp, then it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I Brough the desk model of this lamp several years ago and I was blown away by the quality of the light. First class, and open to individual adjustment. I bought this one for my wife, but she rejected it because the cord was hanging (clipped) out the side. Fortunately, I can use it anyway. However, it would be perfect if the cord simply ran all the way down the pole and came out through the base. This shouldn't be too difficult! Thus four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hinman

customer_reviews.title: TT DL-046 superior to TT DL-072 in some ways
customer_reviews.text: I like TaoTronics products. I am actually exchanging two TT DL-072 (control panel on top of light head -- power cord socket emerges under square base) for two TT DL-046 (control panel on light head pole -- power cord socket built into light head pole). The TT DL-046 has a round base and includes two 16inch/40cm pole extensions so you can choose pole height -- floor, middle, desk). For me, the DL-046 configuration offers better control panel access and it is worth the higher price.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting technology, not so great design
customer_reviews.text: Selecting levels and having the choice of daylight blue and a warmer color temperature are great, but I don't particularly like the design and don't know why the power comes from midway up the stand instead of from the base, creating a tipping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Everett

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy! I like being able to pick between the different light values, bluish or yellowish, depending on whether I'm reading or doing handwork. The five choices for brightness level are very handy. It feels very sturdy and not likely to tip over. It's not as bright as an OTT light but seems to be plenty bright for cross stitching and the light is big enough to light up a good sized area. It doesn't throw off any heat, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I could do without the yellow
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this five stars if it didn't have the yellow light. The white is fine, but it's easy to accidentally shift it to annoying yellow. I don't know why anyone makes reading lights that aren't full spectrum anymore and if I could have found a model that was only white and these dimensions (most floor lamps are absurdly short), I would've bought that. Having said that, it's a good light for the price, and went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about the lamp except the lame cord
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't notice this about the lamp before purchasing, but the cord is NOT tucked away through the pole as many floor lamps are. Therefore, the cord is exposed from the control panel all the way down which is not aesthetically pleasing at all if you're going to use in a nice common room, etc. Lucky for us- this is going in our kid's room so it doesn't make a big difference to us, but still would be a nice design update if they routed the cord through the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Philip, San Jose CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these a couple of months ago for our home offices, and recently purchased two more for other locations in our home. They are slender, light in weight, very effective--providing contrasting light brightness and hue options, and can fit in areas where you don't have much space or don't wish to use much space. This lamp has always been packed very well and is really easy to assemble. I would easily recommend this lamp to others.
customer_reviews.author: SoundPuppies

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is good, but it depends on your needs
customer_reviews.text: I liked that you can choose the ‘color’ of light, I liked the height and look. We also bought the short version of the lamp and liked that you can wirelessly change your phone. But the design of the lamp head left the sides open to glaring unless you were sitting under it. I sat across the room and the light shined in my peripheral vision. The only way around this was to point the lamp head in an odd direction, which gives you less light. The head also glared off the TV, or off the device if you were using one in your lap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 of them for my mother. She and her helpers liked them. Good, easily adjustable light.
customer_reviews.text: My mother needed better light, and these TaoTronics Dimmable LED floor lamps worked well for her. The took up not too much room and could be easily moved and repositioned. The adjustable color temperature made the light more comfortable. They got bright and were maneuverable, enough to be easily positioned when needed to illuminate a plate of food, magazine, or mail. We haven't used them long, so I cannot report on their long term dependability, but we've had no problems with them. And they look okay. They suited the need very well. Thank you TaoTronics.
customer_reviews.author: SVH_Man

customer_reviews.title: Love this floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me and I have to share why - It is a sturdy lamp that was easy to put together, it emits different levels of brightness depending on what you need, and it is easily adjustable to different angles, etc. I got this lamp for reading and doing jigsaw puzzles. I"m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: dtm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought two of these, one for each of our work areas. We work a lot at home in the evenings and these are perfect. The light is adjustable in so many ways ~ brightness, warmth or coolness of the light and where the head is placed. For what these cost, I didn't expect such a sturdy product nor one that was so easy to adjust. I'm thrilled with these and hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: funky_town

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair to use as bedside lamps, mostly for reading in bed. I am more than happy with these. They are dimmable, have options for soft or hard light, and work at the slightest touch...so I can reach out in the night and easily turn them on and off, even without looking. The arm is flexible so I can angle it away from the bed to highlight other parts of the room when I wish.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp except for the power on/off
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of TaoTronics LED desk lamps, so I expected this lamp would be sturdy and bright. This lamp is bright and easy to put together. It would have been better to have the power cord thread through the center column, but it's not a big deal to me. The only disappointment is that the electronic on/off switch means that the lamp cannot be turned on by switched outlet. Once on, it can be switched off by a wall switch.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy light
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was going to just have it bedside but I put it on the night stand. It doesn’t take up as much room as lamp that was there. I don’t think my husband will have a problem turning it on during the night because of the little light on the control pad. They thought of everything. A gentle touch is all that’s needed to turn it on. Sturdy base no wobbling can’t knock over accidentally. Adjustable l.e.d.
customer_reviews.author: mare e

customer_reviews.title: Versatile lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great for a desk with lots of different projects, from reading and writing to drawing and painting. Easy to control both the amount and kind of light (warm vs daylight), and you can direct it to the desired position without much effort. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lamps I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: The lamp has a lot of features for the money. Being able to use it as either a desk or floor lamp is a great benefit; I originally bought it for use as a desk lamp, but then needed to change it to a floor lamp. I prefer daylight "color" light and this lamp does it well. The flexible portion of the lamp is very handy for pointing it exactly where you need it at the moment and it looks very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: X50

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Reading Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this reading lamp. Since the light is adjustable, it can range from low to quite high intensity. And, since there is a way to change from bright white to a slight yellow color light, it's very easy on the eyes. I'm glad I bought this reading lamp, which is LED so it costs almost nothing to use, and should last ~50,000 hours. Great product! Also want to mention, it took me under one minute to assemble. Eazy-Peazy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us! Position, color & brightness are all easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lamp that is easily adjusted to the position, color and brightness that YOU need. My spouse has already found old errors caused by his old dim light & is now happily working both faster & more accurately. It is also very nice looking, cheap to run & will not heat up the area this summer. Wonderful! Also, I ordered it Sunday & it arrived the very next day!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hard for visually challenged user to turn off
customer_reviews.text: Due to the design of the controls, I do not recommend this product for older and visually handicapped buyers. For example, it has turned out to be impossible for my mother to figure out how to simply turn this device on and off, so she just leaves it on all the time. Fortunately, it draws very little power.
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Really like this floor lamp. It came very well packaged. Assembly was a breeze, very intuitive, and still haven't opened the instruction book. Something I really like that wasn't mentioned in description is there is a tiny light in the power button making it easy to find in dim light or in the dark. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, and the fact that it can be a table lamp or stand up. The base is heavy enough to keep it sturdy and light levels go from dim(yellow) to bright(white). Would be great to use for focusing on a detailed project. Customer service did a follow-up, and I asked them for the directions, as we lost them. I feel confident they will email me a link.
customer_reviews.author: HELPIE

customer_reviews.title: Versatile affordable floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in a white option but otherwise this floor lamp and the options it comes with (3 different lights with the different intensities of each color and timer, flexible neck, option to be a table lamp....) just want I needed and a price that I can live with!
customer_reviews.author: KJA2004

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Quality, Quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my light yesterday. It was superbly packaged and arrived in perfect condition. Assembly barely took three minutes. Love the touch controls. So easy to change settings with a gentle touch. Love the ambient light for relaxing, the bright light is perfect for knitting, reading, and crafts. This is the best floor lamp for crafting I have ever had. Extra bonus - it can be converted to a table lap in seconds. Awesome product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for when I am working on my crafts! I love that it offers three types of light each with three levels of brightness. A portion of the "neck" is bendable so you can rotate and adjust the lighting without having to move the entire lamp which is convenient when I am moving from my Cricut table to my work table. It comes nicely packaged and is easy to put together. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I bought this for my living room and ended up moving it to my dining room. The dining room is a larger room and I need it to be a little more bright in the evenings for my birds. This thing brightens the room very well. The bulbs are LED and regardless of the intensity I have it on they never even get warm. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NHTFR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, so far.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed a lamp that can be a floor lamp or table lamp. The assembly is a snap, screw together the sections of the shaft and plug in the power pack and the lamp is ready. Temperatures are a plus and the brightness adjustment works great. Now to see how long it lasts, that is the big question. I will return and cahange my review if I have problems and list them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Use to study and light up living room
customer_reviews.text: I have a dark corner in my living room. Our apartment has no lights in the living room. This lamp can be used to brighten the entire living room easily. But it is also bendable and I can lower the light and use it to study with while the kids are using the living room to watch a movie. Many different light settings so you can set it to where you want it from super bright and blue to yellow and calm.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Winston

customer_reviews.title: Good, but won't work with smart plugs
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint on this light is that it does not remember what state it was in, if power is lost. It stays off, if you unplug it and plug it back in. Which means you can't use it with a smart plug or light switch controlled outlet. Otherwise, great product. Very bright with different light color options and no discernable led flicker.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a fiber artist. When we're watching TV at night she is usually knitting socks or something complicated. The stitching is all but microscopic. She's had numerous lights to do her work by but none has been 'exactly right'. I spotted this unit, bought it, and told her to give it a try. She doesn't like it - she LOVES it. It is exactly what she needed. The controls are very user friendly and the flexible neck makes it good for whatever she's working on. This is a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Frank Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: For this price there is no way you can find such a nice floor lamp. It has 4 modes of light from bright white to natural. Wish it had a telescoping height but its still plenty tall enough and it bends backwards so not a deal breaker. For $39.99 there is not a better lamp. Wanna make it a desk lamp? Just use one of the poles. This thing is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: marsha cornett

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny I paid!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Assembles within minutes, very sleek looking and I like the flexibility. Cons: I wish the cord was longer and could be hidden and didn't hang/dangle along the side of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: BiggBenn

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics is THE BEST Company!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of electronics from TaoTronics, in addition to this lamp. I had a problem with the lamp, and Customer Service immediately sent me out a replacement. I had never had a problem with any of their other products, so I knew the brand is great and reliable. Now I know that if I do have a problem, their Customer Service is even better!
customer_reviews.author: ALLStarship

customer_reviews.title: The switch panel broke after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks the switch panel stopped working. I cannot turn it off at all, the lamp is stuck in a strange cycle of different modes. Then after contacting with seller, a replacement unit arrived shortly after. This replacement unit has been working for over an month, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Great light and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these floor lamps and the swivel desk lamp version. These replaced other desk lamps and an overpriced Ottlite with a bad ballast. They turn on and off with a simple touch and the light adjustment is easy to use. Very bright without getting hot. They're a good solid weight and the gooseneck is helpful to adjust to where you want it. It also does not light up the room and only lights up what you want to see. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NancyL

customer_reviews.title: Great for homework
customer_reviews.text: We have the desk versions from TaoTronics for our bedside and desk. When I saw this floor model, I had to try it out. It is much brighter and perfect for my kids doing homework late at night. We don't have to turn on the whole room light as this covers the whole desk area in a nice even lighting. So far super happy at the 1 month mark.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old floor lamp with bendable neck. When the bulb died again in my old lamp, I saw this and decided to upgrade to LED and touch controls! I like having multiple light choices and the bendable neck is much much better than my old one was. The cord could be longer since it has to travel down about 2/3 rds of the height, but I'm definitely keeping this LIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Jdp

customer_reviews.title: Taotronics does it best!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase from Taotronics. You will find an earlier review where I wrote how much my wife loves her 1st LED lamp. She loves that lamp so much she had me purchase another one. This one is a newer model from Taotronics and both are in my wife's sewing room. One to light up her sewing machine and the latest one for her layout table.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Electronic controls went haywire
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was just ok to begin with then, 6 months later the electronic controls just wouldn't shut the lamp off and the adjustments were wacky - none of the adjustments it originally had... of course too late to return it - I will contact Mfgr and let y'all know. Update June 2020: they sent a replacement but I have not set it up yet - I'm grateful they were responsive.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this lamp. Set up was super easy and foolproof. Works great! The max brightness setting is pretty bright but im not sure why I thought it would be brighter. Im using it for eyelash extensions and it does do the job well, but I may need to get another one for additional brightness. Other that that, I love that it can detach from the floor stand to sit on a desktop! Great purchase :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but will not work with smart switches!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product except that it cannot be used with a smart switch because once it is shut off it will not turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for crafts or reading
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I am so happy I purchased it. I use it when I am doing crafts and it helps a great deal--especially if I drop something. It is so bright and so easy to assemble. I did not know it had a timer on it; when the light went out by itself, I became concerned, but only for a moment. If you have a vintage decor, the lamp may not be aesthetically pleasing, but it is incredibly beneficial if you need a bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Matuszeski

customer_reviews.title: Three lights in one!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic lamp! I need one for reading, knitting, etc. and love the fact that this lamp has three light types and light levels. The controls are midway up the pole and are touch - very easy to reach and adjust. I'm currently using it at my cabin and now plan to purchase another for home.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakinggoddess

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! I have purchased 3 of these for our home. They are a great task light but with a real minimalist presence in you're home. Love that you can adjust the lighting depending on your needs. This company stands behind their with product with a year warranty. I don't think I'll need that with this quality lamp but reassuring even so. I'm a satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LAMP for outdoor cooking as long as it is stored under covered patio.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a lamp to cook on the BBQ at night. This lamp gives us the perfect light when we need to know if the meat is cooked. It is sturdy enough but not too heavy to move. We keep it under covered patio and just slide it to the BBQ. We tried to find an efficient outdoor lamp and could not. So for us this lamp was the perfect solution for the BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Jojolo

customer_reviews.title: super bright, good color range
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bright reading lamp, this one did the trick. I have trouble with reading paper backs, while reading glasses help I have found the color and intensity of the light to be a big factor in how well I can read. This lamp proved very good with changing the color and brightness to a range that felt just right.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Brightness changes during use.  Trouble shooting solved problem.
customer_reviews.text: The light level/tone changes during use. It can start out one way and all of a sudden get bright. The electronic controller is not working correctly. It's bight enough when it decides to go to the setting, but I would like to be able to control when that happens. UPDATE - Taotronics Customer Service suggested unplugging the lamp for awhile and then retrying. Since then it has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GliderMan

customer_reviews.title: Rest Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my desk. Brightness makes a huge difference. Really easy to put together. Especially like the ability to adjust light temperature and the flexibility to move light around. After I got one my wife asked me to get one for her craft table. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a fine product! Is bright enough for my wive, who has eye problems, to read the WSJ again, even do crocheying and knitting. How to turn it on is also a new experience, the slightest touch of the on botton will do the job. Would recommed this product without any reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Horst Stehmer

customer_reviews.title: I love the different qualities of light
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and so far are very happy with them. The are a good height for both my husband's desk and for my sofa. I needed a bright light for hand quilting, but it also can go quite dim, which is really nice when I just want some ambient light. The switch is in a very convenient place on the stem of the lamp. It is quite flexible, so I don't mind that you can't really raise or lower the actual light. I would buy this again based on the performance of these two and the ability to change the brightness and tone of the light from quite cool to quite warm.
customer_reviews.author: M V McFall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money good light
customer_reviews.text: Bright light, great for reading. Replaced a pole light with 3 glass light fixtures because the parts came loose and you had to stand up to turn in on. Not quite as pretty as the old one but very functional and I would purchase again. Well protected shipping container. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anger

customer_reviews.title: Reading Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a reading lamp. I like that I can dim the light for reading, whether it's a book or a tablet. The cord could have been longer and would be better if it connected at the base of the lamp. The flexible neck is great for adjusting to my needs. I like it, but I wouldn't buy another one at the price of forty-nine dollars.
customer_reviews.author: GNOhio

customer_reviews.title: Great features, Very Poor Longevity
customer_reviews.text: Started malfunctioning after 7 months of minimal use. I love the features, variability in light setting color and intensity. It is low profile and unassuming so easy to hide in a busy area. But, who cares if it stops working. After 7 months of minimal use it began flickering and shutting off on it's own. It is not due to auto-shut off feature either! Now it turns on and off and flickers everytime I try to use it.
customer_reviews.author: shibaluvr

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. The lamp is very light in weight with a very flexible neck which makes it easy for work projects, etc. The light intensity is easy to adjust with touch buttons (which I've never seen before). Very easy to use. Update: Lamp stopped working after 11 months, however, customer service was great and sent a replacement. Still very happy with lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Benaya

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor lamp but...
customer_reviews.text: edit: I’m giving it 5 stars now, since the seller has sent me the replacement lamp. This is a nice floor lamp. And when it works, it works great. However, after only 4 or 5 months (I bought it in February, it is now July) it started to flicker sporadically. Every now and then it stops working... I have no idea why, but it feels like it's overheating. I'm not sure how long till it completely stops working, though, since I can't change the bulb or anything... It's a nice floor lamp but I would not buy this again, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: TP2

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC LAMP!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how inexpensive this great lamp is, It gives a lot of light great for sitting and reading . My husband loves it . He can't believe we did without it all these years. Trust me, you won't regret this purchase. It's very bright and doesn't take up any space.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

product_meta.title: TaoTronics LED Floor Lamp 5 brightness levels & 3 colors, 1815 Lumens & 50,000 Hours, Flexible Gooseneck Dimmable Floor Lamp for Reading Living Room, Touch Control, Philips Enabled Licensing Program
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackTaoTronics - Enhance Your Life 
Enjoy life to the fullest with TaoTronics. From industry-leading LED lighting solutions to home goods and audio devices, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life's needs and help you make the most of your daily activities. 

Dimmable LED Floor Lamp Specifications: 
Operating Voltage: DC 10V/1.2A 
Power (for LED panel): 12W 
Lumens: 1800 lm 
Power Voltage: 100V-240V 
Full Range CCT: 2800K-5500K 

What's in the Box: 1 x TaoTronics LED Floor Lamp (Model: TT-DL046)
1 x Power Adapter
1 x User Guide
1 x 1-Year Warranty Card 

Notes: 
1. Memory function restores latest color mode and brightness settings.
2. Press and hold on the power button for 2 sec to turn on 1-hour timer (Power button LED will blinks slowly to signal timer is activated).
feature_bullets: 3 colors & 5 brightness modes: choose from 15 possible combinations to suit your illumination needs; floor lamp shines bright up to 1815 lm with 12W lighting output
Flexible gooseneck: conveniently direct the light where you most need it
Foolproof touch control: set Color, brightness, and a 1-hour timer in case you doze off at night; LED floor lamp features a Memory function to restore previous settings automatically
Safe & user-friendly: UL adapter converts voltage to 10V/1. 2A to prevent electrical hazards; evenly weighted base prevents the lamp from toppling over. And we offer a 12+18 months
2-In-1 convertible design: tall floor lamp for bedroom and office, shortens to meet your needs and environment

specifications.Special Features: Touch Dimmer, Modern Design, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, Flexible Gooseneck, Dimmable, 1800 lm with 12W lighting output, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
specifications.Included Components: 1 x User Guide, 1 x 1-Year Warranty Card, 1 x Power Adapter, 1 x TaoTronics LED Floor Lamp
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,215 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
